name: get_live_streams_livestreamid
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool api_video.
Tool description: api.video is the end-to-end solution that enables you to easily build, scale, and operate on-demand and live-streaming videos in your app, software, or platform. Test it for free on our Sandbox environment.
API description: Retrieves live stream details using the given livestream ID from the RapidAPI service.

livestreamid.description: The ID of the live stream to fetch details for.
